summary: The customer was unhappy with Contoso Wireless' upgrade services and wanted a reliable and fast internet connection. The customer service agent offered a plan with 25 Mbps download speed and 5 Mbps upload speed for $50 per month, but the customer couldn't afford it. The customer service agent then offered a plan with 10 Mbps download speed and 2 Mbps upload speed for only $30 per month, which the customer accepted. The customer service agent then began setting up the new internet connection for the customer.
